1.0.0.name: wordpress/bracketcloud
1.0.0.description:
BracketCloud is an online tournament management platform. This plugin replaces any [bracketcloud] shortcodes with the an embedded tournament from BracketCloud. The shortcode syntax is [bracketcloud tid=123] where tid is the unique tournament ID found in the URL of your tournament page.

This plugin only lets you embed previously created tournaments. To create tournaments, visit http://bracketcloud.com and make an account.
